answerText: Big Bang model[10] This modification of the Big Bang model claims that shortly after the big bang, the universe underwent exponential expansion. Its namesake epoch was the first of the electroweak epoch and it explains why the universe appears flat.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 1 | 11 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Fred Hoyle, a proponent of the alternative steady-state theory, coined its name. For 10 points each: [10] Name this commonly accepted cosmological theory regarding the Universe's creation. The Friedmann-Lemaitre-Robertson-Walker metric describes the universe's expansion under this theory.
